name: Composing-Clocks
shortDescription: Sample app to show how to build an app 100% with Jetpack Compose and MVVM, handling config changes manually, without using AAC-ViewModels but saving user state. It comes with a series of blog posts that explain the process and reasoning.
longDescription: Sample app to show how to build an app 100% with Jetpack Compose and MVVM, handling config changes manually, without using AAC-ViewModels but saving user state. It comes with a series of blog posts that explain the process and reasoning.
